channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IN

item.title: Report E-2025020253
item.description:
Report E-2025020253

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-23T00:59:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-14
  • City: CONNERSVILLE
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: RECLAIMED ENERGY CO., INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Unloaded drum and went to loosen bungs to sample drum. There was a dent near the bung and when loosened caused material to leak. Material was cleaned up in house and the drum was put into a overpack. No material spilled outside of contaminant.

item.title: Report X-2025020899
item.description:
Report X-2025020899

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-23T00:59:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-13
  • City: HAMMOND
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE DUE TO THE RATTLE OF AEROSOL CANS. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED TWO INNER BOXES MARKED AS GROUND LIMITED QUANTITY. ONE BOX CONTAINS TWELVE FLAMMABLE AEROSOL CANS OF GEAR SHIELD EXTRA HEAVY EXTREME PRESSURE LUBRICANT, EACH AT 11OZ. THE OTHER LIMITED QUANTITY MARKED INNER BOX CONTAINS TWELVE FLAMMABLE AEROSOL CANS OF SPRAYON DRY FILM MOLY LUBRICANT, EACH AT 11OZ. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED USING SHIPPER NUMBER 447057, PENNSYLVANIA BEARING, 1951 N GRIFFITH BLVD, GRIFFITH IN 46319-1043. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
